data.actual_result: You get a "connecting" screen and user profile looks offline. Along with not being able to do any functions of course.
data.expected_result: 2 Factor Auth. Should activate and work across devices
data.short_description: 2FA broken On Android after setting it up on PC (Credits to Joshek for the assistance on reproducing) (**MUST TEST ON ANDROID FOR BUG**)
data.steps_to_repro: - Remove 2FA account on any device - Exit discord app mobile, and setup 2FA on PC - Once setup, go to your android app again. - You should now see old messages(no new messages show, and a "loop" of the connecting that never goes away)
